title: MJ生前被禁播的MV《他们不在乎我们》
author: azsx6912121
txt_content:
迈克尔·杰克逊，MJ，70年代的歌王，这首MV，是MJ生前指责美国政府的腐败，做的恶行。
他不在乎我们：http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNTMxMjEzMjgw.html







有兴趣者可以观看下面那部影片：V字仇杀队，别名V字别动队。http://www.iqiyi.com/dianying/20121217/36f4d1fb1b44c440.html

replies.author: jill
replies.txt_content: 我挺喜欢MJ 和V字仇杀队

replies.author: indeed
replies.txt_content: They don't really care about us.

replies.author: zimu27
replies.txt_content: hao tie  wo xi huan  wo  shu ru fa you wen ti  da bu chu lai  han zi l {:10_503:}

replies.author: ALAW
replies.txt_content: 永远崇拜，迈克尔杰克逊！！！！！
